report_title: Industry Report on LAN Gaming Centers
executive_summary: Over the past five years, LAN gaming centers have experienced substantial fluctuations in revenue and customer demand. At the height of the COVID-19 pandemic, dwindling foot traffic and widespread stay-at-home orders brought on a significant drop in revenue. However, as the pandemic subsided, consumers who took up gaming as a pastime during quarantines were able to visit LAN gaming centers and the industry saw a surge in revenue that more than made up for the previous year's dip.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Demand Boomed as the Pandemic Subsided
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Stay-at-home orders and concerns surrounding the virus's transmission brought a drop in revenue for LAN gaming centers through the COVID-19 pandemic, but the industry has enjoyed solid growth in the aftermath that has more than made up for 2020's challenges.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: THE MASSIVE POPULARITY OF GAMING IS SUPPORTING LAN GAMING CENTERS
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: As consumers have spent more time on leisure and recreation, interest in gaming as a hobby has risen. This has, in turn, expanded the base of potential customers for LAN gaming centers.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: PROFIT HAS TAKEN A HIT BUT REMAINS HIGH
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: LAN gaming centers have had to contend with supply chain issues and the trade war with China, which have combined to cut the supply of microchips and hike the price of the industry's main purchases.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: THE RAPID EXPANSION OF ESPORTS IS SET TO BOOST DEMAND FOR LAN CENTERS
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Over the last decade, the popularity of esports has grown immensely, bringing in fans, companies and players from all over the world.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: MORE CONSUMERS ARE EXPECTED TO PICK UP GAMING
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: The total number of broadband connections is expected to climb through the next period, giving more consumers access to the Internet.

industry_definition: LAN gaming centers provide a network of interconnected computers or gaming consoles for customers.
key_trends: Revenue boomed in the wake of COVID-19.
The booming popularity of esports is driving growth for LAN gaming centers.

market_segmentation.segment_description: Men between the ages of 18 and 54 make up the bulk of revenue for the industry.
Studies show this disparity is not as severe as many may think: 46.0% of all gamers are women.

products_and_services.product_description: Multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) games are staples in the top ten list of the most lucrative competitive video games.
In first-person shooter (FPS) games, players experience the game through the eyes of the character they control.

demand_determinants.determinant_description: Over the five years to 2023, rising consumer spending has bolstered demand for industry services.

cost_factors.cost_factor_title: Contracts and licenses with gaming companies to run tournaments
cost_factors.cost_factor_description: From contracts and licenses with gaming companies to run tournaments.

FAQs.question: What qualifications do you expect from your workforce?
FAQs.answer: Operators need to make sure that they have staff that are knowledgeable about both the machinery and the specific games offered at their facilities.
